text: Aji Sax ji du tanqamlu aji jub
Ñeel Daawuda. Mooy ba muy wayadi-wayadilu ca kanam Buur Abimeleg, ba Abimeleg dàq ko, mu dem\f + \fr 34.1 \ft Seetal ci \bk 1.Samiyel\bk* 21.11-16. Akis buurub Gaat mooy Abimeleg ba tey.\f*.
Naa màggal Aji Sax ji saa su ne,
di ko sant fu ma tollu.
Aji Sax ji laay sagoo,
néew-ji-doole dégg, bég.
Kañleen Aji Sax ji, ànd ceek man,
nu bokk wormaal turam.
Maa topp Aji Sax ji, mu nangul ma,
tàggale maak lépp lu ma ragal.
Ku yaakaar Aji Sax ji bég, leer nàññ,
gàcce du ko sëlëm.
Néew-ji-doole woote, Aji Sax ji wuyu,
musal ko fu mu jàqe.
Ku ragal Aji Sax ji, malaakaam yiir la,
di la wallu.
Mosleen, xam ne Aji Sax jee baax,
ndokkalee yaw mi ko làqoo.
Ragalleen Aji Sax ji, yeen nitam ñu \w sell|sell:\w* ñi;
ku ko ragal doo ñàkk dara.
Gaynde man naa ndóol, xiif,
nit kiy jaamu Aji Sax ji ñàkkul lenn lu baax.
Dikkal doom, déglu ma,
ma jàngal la ni ñuy ragale Aji Sax ji.
Ana ku dund neex,
mu bëgga fekke bés bu rafet, ba gis ngëneel?
Na làmmiñam daw lu aay,
dawi fen.
Na dëddu lu bon tey def lu baax,
sàkku jàmm, saxoo ko.
Ay gët la Aji Sax ji ne jàkk aji jub ñi,
te ay noppam la dékk seeni woote wall.
Aji Sax jeey won gannaaw ñiy def lu bon,
ngir dagge leen kaw suuf, far seeni tur.
Ñi jub yuuxu, Aji Sax ji dégg,
fu ñu jàqe, mu musal leen.
Seen yaakaar tas, Aji Sax ji jege leen,
seen xol jeex, Aji Sax ji wallu leen.
Musiba bare naa dal ku jub,
Aji Sax ji musal ko ci lépp,
di ko sàmm,
ba benn yaxam du damm.
Musiba nag day rey ku bon,
te ku bañ aji jub, yoon dab na la.
Aji Sax jeey musal ab jaamam,
képp ku ko làqoo, yoon du la dab.
